Html: I used QuickGraph for .Net 2.0 at some of the projects. Today I downloaded latest version of it, but unfortunately i saw that some of the classes had been removed (such that IdentifiableEdge, IdentifiableVertex) which i used them in many places in my  source.  I looked and tried to find new classes that took place of these missing classes but i couldn't succeed.  Are there any classes in this latest version similar to IdentifiableEdge, IdentifiableVertex classes that i couldn't detect?
The algorithm that used to rely IdentifiableEgde/Vertex now receives a delegate that maps an edge/vertex to string. This is a more flexible solution to provide identities to edge/vertices.
